content: please note that this is a crochet pattern only pdf file not the finished product this petite series is free pattern designed by woolly doodly approximate size 16 cm including hat difficulty level easy yarn nude grey red white crochet hook 3 00mm or 5/0 other materials needed to create petite gnome yarn needle scissors safety eyes fiberfill / polyfil i would love to see the pictures of your finished creation please do share your gorgeous work and tag me on instagram @woolly doodly if you have any question about the pattern simply dm me on instagram and i ll be happy to guide you happy crocheting
